labelDescription: Issues related to accessibility. This means that the issue is about making the product usable for people with disabilities, and could relate to font size, color contrast, screen reader support, etc.
Issues revolving around application compatibility across PowerToys. Should only be applied to issues who have compatibility issues with other applications.
Issues pertaining to the build system, CI, infrastructure, etc. Should only be applied to issues that aren't directly affecting the product but are instead around the build system for the product.
Related to context menu bugs or enhancements. Usually this is the File Explorer context menu.
Issues relevant to large enterprises, such as:  SCCM, run as admin restrictions, group policy, etc. ...
Issues refering to the PowerToys flyout launched from the tray area
issues regarding to localization, which means that a language is not supported or that the translation is not correct
Issues regarding the PowerToys logging facility
Issues regarding the first time experience for PowerToys, or the out of box experience.
Issues regarding the set up or install of PowerToys
Issues that relate to telemetry
issues that relate to tests
FancyZone dragging / interaction issue. Should only be applied to issues that are related to the Fancy Zones feature.
Issue revolving the FancyZone Editor. Should only be applied to issues that are related to the Fancy Zones feature.
Issue around shortcut keys in FancyZones. Should only be applied to issues that are related to the Fancy Zones feature.
Issue for layouts in FancyZones. Should only be applied to issues that are related to the Fancy Zones feature.
FancyZone setting issue. Should only be applied to issues that are related to the Fancy Zones feature.
Issue that deal with FZ and VDs. Should only be applied to issues that are related to the Fancy Zones feature.
New feature or request on an existing product
Suggestion for a PowerToy
Documentation issue that needs to be improved
